title: Consolidate coding guidelines into core + language deltas
description:
Restructure coding guidelines to eliminate duplication:

**Current state (1,955 lines):**
- coding-guidelines-javascript.md - 681 lines
- coding-guidelines-powerquery.md - 495 lines
- coding-guidelines-python.md - 353 lines
- coding-guidelines-sql.md - 426 lines

**New structure (~700 lines total):**

Create coding-guidelines/:
- core.md (~200 lines) - shared principles: error handling patterns, file operation patterns, testing approaches, documentation standards, security practices
- javascript.md (~120 lines) - JS-specific only
- python.md (~120 lines) - Python-specific only
- sql.md (~130 lines) - SQL-specific only
- powerquery.md (~130 lines) - PQ-specific only

**Files to modify:**
- Create: .claude/reference/coding-guidelines/ directory
- Create: core.md, language-specific files
- Archive or delete: old monolithic files

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Same coverage, no information lost
- ~1,255 lines eliminated (64% reduction)
- Easy to add new languages with just deltas
notes: Completed 2026-01-22. Created coding-guidelines/ directory with core.md and 4 language-specific files (javascript.md, python.md, sql.md, powerquery.md). Original files archived to .archive/consolidated-2026-01-22/. Achieved ~75% reduction from 1,955 lines to ~500 lines.
decision_rationale: Extracted shared principles into core.md to avoid repetition. Kept language-specific files focused on syntax and patterns unique to each language.
